Impact of HappinessEach civilization scores 2 culture per happy face (max 16) and loses 2 per discontent worker. Orange scores 16 culture Purple scores 16 culture Green scores 6 culture Grey scores 16 culture
Impact of IndustryEach civilization scores culture equal to the amount of resources it produce. Orange scores 8 culture Purple scores 0 culture Green scores 0 culture Grey scores 2 culture
